Uses of Interface
popt4jlib.ObserverIntf

  • Packages that use ObserverIntf 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.GA
    Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS.FA
    Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib

      Methods in popt4jlib with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SubjectIntf.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      add back a new solution produced by the obs Observer
      boolean SubjectIntf.registerObserver(ObserverIntf o)
      registers an observer to listen to changes to this subject
      boolean SubjectIntf.removeObserver(ObserverIntf o)
      removes an observer from this subject's registered observers

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.GA

      Classes in popt4jlib.GA that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DGA
      The DGA class implements a thread-safe parallel Distributed Genetic Algorithm that follows the island-model of GA computation, with an elitist selection strategy that uses roulette-wheel selection of individuals based on their fitness (that is computed every generation).
      Methods in popt4jlib.GA with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DGA.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      allows an ObserverIntf object to add back into the DGA process an improvement to the incumbent solution it was given.
      boolean DGA.registerObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      allows an Object that implements the ObserverIntf interface to register with this DGA object and thus be notified whenever new incumbent solutions are produced by the DGA process.
      boolean DGA.removeObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      removes an Object that implements the ObserverIntf that has been registered to listen for new solutions.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.GradientDescent

      Classes in popt4jlib.GradientDescent that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlternatingVariablesDescent
      Alternating Variables Optimization: the class implements a method suitable for the (box-constrained) local-optimization of functions in R^n where some or all of the function variables are constrained to assume values from a discrete set (eg when some variables must take on integer values only, or when some variables must take on values that are an integer multiple of some quantity).
      class  ArmijoSteepestDescentST
      Single-Threaded version of the ArmijoSteepestDescent class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  FletcherConjugateGradientST
      Single-Threaded version of the FletcherConjugateGradient class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.
      class  PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST
      Single-Threaded version of the PolakRibiereConjugateGradient class that implements a single try, single threaded local optimization from a single initial point to a local stationary point of the function to be optimized.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.PS

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DPSO
      A parallel implementation of the Particle Swarm Optimization algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects.
      Methods in popt4jlib.PS with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DPSO.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      allows an ObserverIntf object to add back into the DPSO process an improvement to the incumbent solution it was given.
      boolean DPSO.registerObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      allows an Object that implements the ObserverIntf interface to register with this DPSO object and thus be notified whenever new incumbent solutions are produced by the DPSO process.
      boolean DPSO.removeObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      removes an Object that implements the ObserverIntf that has been registered to listen for new solutions.

    • Uses of ObserverIntf in popt4jlib.PS.FA

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS.FA that implement ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DFA
      A parallel implementation of the Firefly Algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects.
      Methods in popt4jlib.PS.FA with parameters of type ObserverIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DFA.addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      allows an ObserverIntf object to add back into the DFA process an improvement to the incumbent solution it was given.
      boolean DFA.registerObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      allows an Object that implements the ObserverIntf interface to register with this DPSO object and thus be notified whenever new incumbent solutions are produced by the DFA process.
      boolean DFA.removeObserver(ObserverIntf observer)
      removes an Object that implements the ObserverIntf that has been registered to listen for new solutions.
